name: Horse Back Ride 'N Swim
description: Imagine exploring the incredibly gorgeous countryside of Jamaica on horseback. Amble through a tropical rainforest atop a sleek, gentle mare or serene stallion. Ride along a cliff and feast your eyes on panoramic vistas of the Jamaican coastline with the aquamarine ocean sparkling in the island sunshine. Then, prepare yourself for a totally unique experience, as you cross the white sand of a pristine beach on horseback and enter the warm waters of the Caribbean. Trot through the crystal seas together and enjoy the ride of your life. Maximum weight limit is 220 lbs.
